stimulusHtml: Based on the poster and the context in which it was created, the Nazis were campaigning in response to the

features.html:
Nazi Political Poster, Germany, 1932

GRANGER

The text reads:“Against Hunger and Despair! Vote Hitler!”

choicesHtml: refugee crisis following the creation of a new Polish state
economic crisis following the United States stock market crash
hyperinflation resulting from the imposition of reparations payments on Germany
loss of German colonial possessions in the settlements ending the First World War
